basics.name: Alec Aaron Alegria
basics.label: Product Designer
basics.summary: As I'm wrapping up my final year at the Art Institute of Austin, I'm looking to join an energetic team to solve complex business problems with customer-centric solutions. I get a kick from playing with my imagination, prototyping delightful experiences, and using a proactive attitude to understand the stories behind problems and their solutions.

work.summary: My time at RGVision was invested in helping with their bi-monthly publication while maintaining their web presence through social media and email campagins.
highlights: Improved company processes by introducing new technology to help streamline success and collaboration across departments.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Finished the term with GPA 3.9 or higher

awards.title: Featured Work
awards.summary: Class projects have been featured to be displayed for prospective students and as examples for exemplary craftsmanship

skills.name: Design
keywords: Prototyping, Wireframing, Research, Content Writing, UI Design, Information Architecture
